author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

following up on #43123 this PR removes the specific setting for merging NANO files

#### PR validation:

I don't think there exist a T0 merge testing workflow in the matrix as it is, hence I let the cmsbot test do it's thing, and we will check with Tier0 operation how to test

FYI : @drkovalskyi
title: remove nano specific setting for IMT
